Shonen.title: One Piece
Shonen.review: The ultimate adventure manga. Oda's worldbuilding, character development, and emotional storytelling create an unparalleled epic spanning decades.

Shonen.title: Naruto
Shonen.review: A ninja's journey from outcast to legend. Kishimoto crafts incredible battles and emotionally resonant character arcs in this defining modern shonen.

Shonen.title: Bleach
Shonen.review: Stylish supernatural action with iconic character designs. Kubo's artwork and creative power system make for consistently entertaining battles.

Shonen.title: My Hero Academia
Shonen.review: A fresh take on superhero manga. Horikoshi delivers inspiring heroism, intense battles, and genuine heart in this modern classic.

Shonen.title: Demon Slayer
Shonen.review: Gorgeous art meets emotionally driven demon-slaying action. Gotouge creates unforgettable characters and breathtaking battle sequences.

Shonen.title: Hunter x Hunter
Shonen.review: Togashi's masterpiece of strategic battles and moral complexity. Every arc introduces innovative concepts that elevate shonen storytelling.

Shonen.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
Shonen.review: Dark, stylish, and intensely creative. Akutami combines horror elements with shonen action for a uniquely compelling experience.

Shonen.title: Dragon Ball
Shonen.review: The legendary series that defined battle shonen. Toriyama's iconic art and escalating power levels created the blueprint for generations.

Shonen.title: Black Clover
Shonen.review: An underdog's magical journey with heart and determination. Tabata delivers consistent action and inspiring character growth.

Shonen.title: Chainsaw Man
Shonen.review: Fujimoto's chaotic masterpiece breaks shonen conventions. Unpredictable, visceral, and emotionally devastating in the best way.

Seinen.title: Berserk
Seinen.review: The dark fantasy masterpiece. Miura's unparalleled art and brutal exploration of trauma, revenge, and humanity set the gold standard.

Seinen.title: Vagabond
Seinen.review: Inoue's breathtaking artwork depicts Musashi's journey from savage warrior to enlightened master. A meditation on strength and purpose.

Seinen.title: Vinland Saga
Seinen.review: A Viking epic that evolves from revenge tale to profound anti-war meditation. Yukimura crafts unforgettable characters and moral complexity.

Seinen.title: Tokyo Ghoul
Seinen.review: Ishida's tragic masterpiece of identity and monstrosity. Dark, symbolic, and intensely emotional with stunning artistic expression.

Seinen.title: Monster
Seinen.review: Urasawa's thriller masterpiece. A surgeon's ethical choice leads to a cat-and-mouse game with a charismatic psychopath.

Seinen.title: Oyasumi Punpun
Seinen.review: Asano's devastating exploration of depression and existence. Not for the faint of heart, but unforgettably powerful.

Seinen.title: Kingdom
Seinen.review: Epic Chinese historical warfare manga. Hara delivers massive battles, strategic brilliance, and inspiring leadership stories.

Seinen.title: Homunculus
Seinen.review: Surreal psychological horror exploring perception and trauma. Yamamoto creates an unsettling journey into human darkness.

Seinen.title: Akumetsu
Seinen.review: Dark vigilante justice tackling Japanese corruption. Extreme methods and moral complexity create gripping social commentary.

Seinen.title: Pluto
Seinen.review: Urasawa's brilliant Astro Boy reimagining. A murder mystery exploring AI consciousness and what it means to be human.

Action.title: One Punch Man
Action.review: Murata's godly artwork transforms ONE's satire into visual spectacle. Hilarious and thrilling superhero action.

Action.title: Attack on Titan
Action.review: Isayama's masterpiece of mystery, action, and moral complexity. Every revelation reshapes understanding in this titan-slaying epic.

Action.title: Mob Psycho 100
Action.review: ONE's heartfelt story of psychic coming-of-age. Explosive action balanced with genuine emotional growth and kindness.

Action.title: Fullmetal Alchemist
Action.review: Arakawa's perfectly crafted adventure. Alchemy, brotherhood, and sacrifice blend into an unforgettable masterpiece.

Action.title: Tokyo Revengers
Action.review: Time-travel delinquent drama with intense gang warfare. Wakui creates compelling characters and escalating stakes.

Action.title: Dorohedoro
Action.review: Hayashida's wonderfully weird dystopian world. Grotesque magic, dark humor, and memorable characters create unique chaos.

Action.title: Fire Punch
Action.review: Fujimoto's debut is brutal, bizarre, and brilliant. A man eternally burning seeks revenge in a frozen apocalypse.

Action.title: Gantz
Action.review: Disturbing sci-fi death game with no-holds-barred violence. Oku creates intense alien hunting action.

Action.title: Hellsing
Action.review: Hirano's ultra-violent vampire mayhem. Alucard's overpowered destruction paired with gothic atmosphere.

Action.title: Holyland
Action.review: Realistic street fighting manga about finding purpose. Bullied boy transforms through martial arts.

Isekai.title: Re:Zero
Isekai.review: Dark time-loop isekai exploring trauma and determination. Nagatsuki creates genuine stakes through suffering and growth.

Isekai.title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
Isekai.review: Fun monster evolution isekai with nation-building. Rimuru's journey from slime to demon lord is consistently entertaining.

Isekai.title: Mushoku Tensei
Isekai.review: The isekai that influenced countless others. Rifujin creates deep worldbuilding and genuine character development.

Isekai.title: Overlord
Isekai.review: Trapped as a skeletal overlord in an MMO world. Maruyama explores moral ambiguity from the villain's perspective.

Isekai.title: The Rising of the Shield Hero
Isekai.review: Betrayed hero's dark revenge journey. Aneko crafts compelling character growth through adversity.

Isekai.title: Ascendance of a Bookworm
Isekai.review: Book-loving girl revolutionizes medieval world. Wholesome isekai focused on knowledge and culture.

Isekai.title: KonoSuba
Isekai.review: Hilarious isekai comedy with useless party members. Akatsuki perfectly parodies and celebrates the genre.

Isekai.title: Log Horizon
Isekai.review: Strategic MMO isekai about building society. Focuses on politics, economics, and community.

Isekai.title: The Eminence in Shadow
Isekai.review: Delusion becomes reality in this comedic isekai. Chuunibyou protagonist accidentally creates real conspiracies.

Isekai.title: Sword Art Online
Isekai.review: The series that popularized modern isekai. Death game MMO with high stakes and romance.

Fantasy.title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
Fantasy.review: Beautiful meditation on time, mortality, and understanding humanity. Yamada creates profound fantasy through simple moments.

Fantasy.title: Magi: The Labyrinth of Magic
Fantasy.review: Epic Arabian Nights inspired adventure. Ohtaka builds a rich world of magic, dungeons, and kingdom politics.

Fantasy.title: Made in Abyss
Fantasy.review: Deceptively cute visuals hide brutal exploration horror. Tsukushi creates an unforgettable descent into darkness.

Fantasy.title: Fairy Tail
Fantasy.review: Mashima's magical guild adventures emphasize friendship and heart. Consistently fun battles and character bonds.

Fantasy.title: Magi: The Seven Deadly Sins
Fantasy.review: Knights seek redemption in magical Britannia. Suzuki blends action, comedy, and mythology effectively.

Fantasy.title: Nausica√§ of the Valley of the Wind
Fantasy.review: Miyazaki's environmental epic. Breathtaking worldbuilding and meditation on nature versus humanity.

Fantasy.title: Claymore
Fantasy.review: Dark fantasy about half-human demon slayers. Yagi crafts compelling lore and memorable warrior women.

Fantasy.title: Dungeon Meshi (Delicious in Dungeon)
Fantasy.review: Gourmet dungeon exploration manga. Kui blends cooking, comedy, and compelling worldbuilding brilliantly.

Fantasy.title: Pandora Hearts
Fantasy.review: Gothic mystery with Alice in Wonderland themes. Mochizuki weaves complex time-loop narrative beautifully.

Fantasy.title: The Ancient Magus' Bride
Fantasy.review: Gentle dark fantasy about magic and healing. Yamazaki creates atmospheric fairy tale romance.

SciFi.title: Akira
SciFi.review: Otomo's cyberpunk masterpiece defined manga's global impact. Psychic powers, dystopia, and stunning art.

SciFi.title: Ghost in the Shell
SciFi.review: Shirow explores consciousness in the digital age. Philosophical cyberpunk questioning reality and identity.

SciFi.title: Steins;Gate
SciFi.review: Time travel thriller with genuine emotional stakes. Brilliantly executed butterfly effect narrative.

SciFi.title: Blame!
SciFi.review: Nihei's apocalyptic mega-structure journey. Sparse dialogue, endless architecture, and haunting atmosphere.

SciFi.title: Battle Angel Alita
SciFi.review: Cybernetic martial arts in dystopian future. Kishiro blends philosophy, action, and transhumanism.

SciFi.title: Planetes
SciFi.review: Realistic space debris collectors manga. Yukimura's grounded sci-fi explores humanity's future in space.

SciFi.title: 20th Century Boys
SciFi.review: Urasawa's sprawling sci-fi mystery spanning decades. Childhood games become apocalyptic conspiracies.

SciFi.title: Dr. Stone
SciFi.review: Rebuilding civilization from stone age. Inagaki makes science exciting through creative problem-solving.

SciFi.title: Parasyte
SciFi.review: Body horror invasion manga exploring coexistence. Iwaaki creates thoughtful alien parasite thriller.

SciFi.title: All You Need Is Kill
SciFi.review: Time-loop alien warfare. Sakurazaka's brutal military sci-fi inspired Edge of Tomorrow.

Slice of Life & Comedy.title: A Silent Voice
Slice of Life & Comedy.review: Oima's powerful story about redemption, disability, and connection. Emotionally devastating and uplifting.

Slice of Life & Comedy.title: March Comes in Like a Lion
Slice of Life & Comedy.review: Umino's gentle exploration of depression and healing through shogi and found family. Beautiful character work.

Slice of Life & Comedy.title: Grand Blue Dreaming
Slice of Life & Comedy.review: Hilarious college diving club comedy. Inoue creates laugh-out-loud chaos with perfect comedic timing.

Slice of Life & Comedy.title: Kaguya-sama: Love Is War
Slice of Life & Comedy.review: Romantic comedy as psychological warfare. Akasaka's genius students refuse to confess first.

Slice of Life & Comedy.title: Barakamon
Slice of Life & Comedy.review: Calligrapher finds inspiration on rural island. Heartwarming slice of life about art and community.

Slice of Life & Comedy.title: Yotsuba&!
Slice of Life & Comedy.review: Pure joy captured in manga form. Azuma's energetic child protagonist radiates infectious wonder.

Slice of Life & Comedy.title: Skip and Loafer
Slice of Life & Comedy.review: Wholesome high school slice of life. Takamatsu creates genuine relationships and personal growth.

Slice of Life & Comedy.title: Gintama
Slice of Life & Comedy.review: Brilliant comedy blending parody, action, and heart. Sorachi seamlessly shifts between hilarious and emotional.

Slice of Life & Comedy.title: Laid-Back Camp
Slice of Life & Comedy.review: Cozy camping manga that warms the soul. Afro creates perfect comfort food storytelling.

Slice of Life & Comedy.title: The Way of the Househusband
Slice of Life & Comedy.review: Ex-yakuza becomes dedicated househusband. Oono's deadpan humor makes everyday tasks hilarious.

Sports.title: Haikyuu!!
Sports.review: Furudate's volleyball masterpiece captures pure joy of competition. Every match delivers tactical brilliance and emotional payoff.

Sports.title: Slam Dunk
Sports.review: The basketball manga that defined the genre. Inoue's delinquent-turned-player creates iconic sports storytelling.

Sports.title: Blue Lock
Sports.review: Battle royale soccer to create ultimate striker. Kaneshiro's explosive approach revolutionizes sports manga.

Sports.title: Hajime no Ippo
Sports.review: The definitive boxing manga spanning decades. Morikawa creates inspiring underdog journey with technical mastery.

Sports.title: Kuroko's Basketball
Sports.review: Supernatural basketball with phantom player. Fujimaki adds shounen power system to sports.

Sports.title: Ashita no Joe
Sports.review: Classic boxing manga about redemption through fighting. Chiba and Kajiwara's tragic masterpiece.

Sports.title: Ping Pong
Sports.review: Matsumoto's artistic table tennis exploration. More about life philosophy than just sports.

Sports.title: Eyeshield 21
Sports.review: American football manga with Shonen Jump energy. Inagaki and Murata deliver exciting strategic gameplay.

Sports.title: Yowamushi Pedal
Sports.review: Otaku discovers competitive cycling talent. Watanabe creates intense road racing drama.

Sports.title: Days
Sports.review: Heartfelt soccer manga about hardwork triumphing over talent. Yasuda emphasizes passion and growth.

Supernatural.title: Death Note
Supernatural.review: Ohba and Obata's cat-and-mouse thriller. Supernatural death game becomes battle of intellects.

Supernatural.title: Bleach
Supernatural.review: Soul reaper battles with incredible style. Kubo's supernatural world features iconic character design.

Supernatural.title: Noragami
Supernatural.review: Minor god seeks recognition through odd jobs. Adachitoka blends comedy and supernatural action.

Supernatural.title: Blue Exorcist
Supernatural.review: Son of Satan becomes exorcist. Kato creates engaging demon-hunting adventures.

Supernatural.title: Natsume's Book of Friends
Supernatural.review: Gentle yokai stories about connection and loneliness. Midorikawa creates atmospheric supernatural healing.

Supernatural.title: Mononoke
Supernatural.review: Medicine seller exorcises supernatural entities. Unique art style and psychological horror.

Supernatural.title: xxxHolic
Supernatural.review: CLAMP's supernatural wish shop. Beautiful art and meaningful supernatural encounters.

Supernatural.title: Toilet-Bound Hanako-kun
Supernatural.review: School mysteries with charming ghost. AidaIro blends cute art with dark supernatural secrets.

Supernatural.title: Hell's Paradise
Supernatural.review: Condemned criminals seek immortality on deadly island. Kaku creates brutal supernatural survival.

Supernatural.title: Mushishi
Supernatural.review: Atmospheric episodic tales of mysterious life forms. Urushibara's meditative supernatural masterpiece.
